name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44269157

> [[ 62 ]]

Your vision snaps up from the holographic screen in time to see a familiar pair of dolls push through the crowd. These two aren't moving as aimlessly or slowly as the others, instead stomping directly towards you; Aelriss begins to direct them away with her staff, but they move around her entirely, fixated on you.

You draw your sword again, raising it in time to deflect the pairs of ghostly claws extended in your direction.

> If you fight this one out, you'll be able to wait as long as you need to.
> Get moving towards the hallway.
> Head toward the center of the crowd to find the others.
> Make your way to the closest set of bookshelves in search of Nel.
